The UFC returns to Singapore this week with a pair of highly touted welterweights in the main event.

UFC on ESPN+ 20 takes place Saturday at Singapore Indoor Stadium in Singapore. The card streams on ESPN+.

(Click here to open a PDF of the staff picks grid in a separate window.)

In the main event, former welterweight and middleweight title challenger Demian Maia (27-9 MMA, 21-9 UFC) takes on former Bellator and ONE Championship titleholder Ben Askren (19-1 MMA, 1-1 UFC), who is coming off a 5-second knockout loss to Jorge Masvidal. The oddsmakers have made Askren a favorite of around -175, and our 13 MMA Junkie editors, writers, radio hosts and videographers are taking him at a fairly heavy 9-4 clip.

In the co-main event, Michael Johnson (19-14 MMA, 11-10 UFC) is more than a 3-1 favorite in his lightweight fight against Stevie Ray (22-9 MMA, 6-4 UFC), and he’s the overwhelming pick of 11 of our 13 staff members.

Beneil Dariush (16-4-1 MMA, 10-4-1 UFC) is only a -150 favorite in his lightweight fight against Frank Camacho (22-7 MMA, 2-3 UFC), but he’s the biggest favorite among our staff members. Only one picker is taking Camacho to win a mild upset.

Ciryl Gane (4-0 MMA, 1-0 UFC) is a heavy favorite, as well, among our pickers in his heavyweight fight against Don'Tale Mayes (7-2 MMA, 0-0 UFC). Gane is the biggest favorite on the entire card at -360 and has an 11-2 picks lead.

And to open the main card, Muslim Salikhov (15-2 MMA, 2-1 UFC) takes on Laureano Staropoli (9-1 MMA, 2-0 UFC) at welterweight in our most competitive fight, picks-wise. Salikhov nearly is a 2-1 favorite, but he has the narrowest possible picks lead at 7-6.

In the MMA Junkie reader consensus picks, Askren (64%), Johnson (79 percent), Dariush (78 percent), Gane (82 percent) and Salikhov (54 percent) are the choices.

Check out all the picks above.
description: Check out our staff members' picks for the UFC on ESPN+ 20 main card in Singapore.
